text:
@realDonaldTrump Art of the Coronavirus Relief Deal:
One of the largest provisions is $170bn tax relief for real estate investors & hedge funds (e.g. Trump & Kushner) larger than total relief for hospitals ($100 billion) & all state & local governments ($150 billion). Good times at Mar a Largo!
